PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2018-06972018-06-06,  ,  ,  PPC, 
ActCanadian Transportation Accident Investigation and Safety Board Act
PrecisRe-appointment of KATHLEEN CAROL FOX of Gatineau, Quebec, as a full-time member of the Canadian Transportation Accident Investigation and Safety Board, to hold office during good behaviour for a term of five years; and her designation as Chairperson of the Board, effective August 21, 2018.
